title: Fall in love with our amazing resort-style amenities!
posting_body: ['Location:', '5700 SEPULVEDA BLVD - Sherman Oaks, CA 91411', 'Rental Information:', '$3220/Month | 2 Bedroom 2 Bath | 986 sq ft', 'Lease Terms:', '12-Month', 'More Information:', 'show contact info', 'What you’ll find in our community!', '◾ 24-Hour Package Lockers', '◾ Barbecue and Picnic Area', '◾ Bike Racks', '◾ Business Center', '◾ Elevators', '◾ Emergency Maintenance', '◾ Entertainment Pavilion', '◾ On-Site Maintenance', '◾ Pet Friendly', '◾ Swimming Pool & Spa', '◾ Easy Access to Los Angeles', '◾ Fit-X Studio on Demand Fitness Training', '◾ Freeways, Public Transit & Canyon Passages Nearby', '◾ IMT Active Featuring Top-of-the-Line Cardio Training Options and Free Weights', '◾ Large Pets Welcome - Subject to Comm.', 'Guidelines', '◾ Minutes to Sherman Oaks Galleria', '◾', 'My IMT Resident Portal with Online and On-Site Kiosk Access: Utilities Connection, Rent Payment, Service Requests, Account Information and Community Postings', '◾ Near Westfield Fashion Square', '◾ Quick Access To 405 And 101 Freeways', '◾ Trash and Recyclable Chutes', 'Features in this apartment home!', '◾ Kitchen Pantry in Select Homes', '◾', 'Large Closets', '◾ Lush Carpet in Bedrooms', '◾ Prewired for Cable', '◾ Private Patio or Balcony', '◾ Quartz Countertops', '◾ Spacious Bedrooms with Large Closets', '◾ Stainless Kitchen Sink', '◾ Washer/Dryer', '◾ Window Coverings', '◾ Nest Thermostats', 'Call IMT 5700 at', 'show contact info', '**Walk-ins welcome & choose from 3 tour options.', '**', 'Situated directly on Sepulveda Boulevard, IMT 5700 offers all the conveniences and advantages of a metropolitan lifestyle one would expect when living in a prime location within the San Fernando Valley.', 'IMT 5700 is across the street from Target, and just minutes away from the Sherman Oaks Galleria, the 405 Freeway and the Balboa Recreation Center offering easy access to golf courses, tennis courts, jogging, bike paths, and boating on Balboa Lake.', 'Take a Virtual Tour of Our Property Today!', '<URL>', 'Website:', '<URL>', 'Pet Policy:', 'Breed Restriction', 'No Weight Restrictions At IMT 5700, we know that the path to your heart is marked with paw prints and that the best part of your day is coming home to a wagging tail.', 'Pets are residents too!', 'Two pet maximum', 'No weight restrictions, breed restrictions apply', 'Pet deposit: $500 (for up to two pets)', 'Pet rent: $50 per month, per pet', 'Management:', 'IMT Residential', '*Price is subject to change without prior notice', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '50C7CDE1D77F4B']
